description: This file defines a React hook `useScrollReveal` that provides intersection observation effects for elements with data attributes to animate or reveal them as they enter the viewport. It includes helper functions for reduced motion preferences and staggered delays for child elements.

methods.name: getPrefersReducedMotion()
methods.description: Checks if the user has enabled reduced motion preferences via media query.

methods.name: applyStaggerDelays(root = document)
methods.description: Applies staggered transition delays to children of elements marked with data-reveal-stagger, based on a configurable step value.

methods.name: useScrollReveal(options = {})
methods.description: A React hook that sets up an IntersectionObserver to animate elements with data-reveal attribute, supporting options for root, margin, threshold, and whether to only reveal once.
